commandDescription: Validates alignment between XML and CSV representations of record types using string comparison or logic comparison
inputFlagDescription: Comma-separated list of record type names to validate (without extension). If not specified, all record types will be validated
objectFlagDescription: Comma-separated list of object names to validate. If not specified, all objects will be processed
recordtypeFlagDescription: Comma-separated list of specific record type names to validate within objects
modeFlagDescription: Validation mode: 'string' for full string comparison, 'logic' for in-memory structure comparison (default: %s)
noItemsFound: No record types found to validate
validationSummary: Validation Summary: %s record types validated, %s aligned, %s misaligned
examples: sf easysources recordtypes arealigned -s Account,Contact --mode string
sf easysources recordtypes arealigned -s Account -r Standard,Custom -m logic
sf easysources recordtypes arealigned --sort false --mode string
